org.hps.monitoring.plotting

Class ExportPdf

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.monitoring.plotting.ExportPdf

extends Object
    This is a class for exporting plot graphics to PDF.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public static void write(List<hep.aida.IPlotter> plotters,
                         String fileName,
                         List<String> runData)
                  throws IOException
        Save a set of tabs containing plots to a file.
        Parameters:
        plotters - the list of plotters to save (from plots in the regions)
        fileName - the file name
        runData - the list of run data to save on the cover page
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem with the IO (e.g. writing to PDF file)

      • writePage

                      com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter writer,
                      hep.aida.IPlotter plotter)
               throws IOException
        Write a plotter's graphics into a single PDF page.
        Parameters:
        document - the output PDF document
        writer - the PDF writer
        image - the buffered bitmap image
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem writing to the PDF document

        Get a buffered image from a Swing component.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the image from painting the component onto a buffered image
